##### FILE: mongo.app.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        limits:
          cpu: "0.5"
          memory: 512Mi
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        requests:
          cpu: "0.25"
          memory: 256Mi
        resources: null

---

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: mongo1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: mongo104_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:6.0.6
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mongo
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mongo105.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongo12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: var/www/mongo
          name: mongodb
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pv

---

##### FILE: mongo125.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo131.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: mongo133.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---

kind: Deployment

  name: mongodb-deployment

    metadata:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongoexpress-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongoexpress-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongoexpress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongoexpress
      name: mongoexpress-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          value: root
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-service
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongoexpress-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

apiVersion: v1
data:
  init-db.js: |
    db.createUser({
      user: "root",
      pwd: "secret",
      roles: [
        { role: "userAdminAnyDatabase", db: "admin" },
        { role: "readWriteAnyDatabase", db: "admin" }
      ]
    });
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mongo-initdb-script
  namespace: clinic-system

##### FILE: mongo141_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to clinic-system/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: clinic-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --auth
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongo-initdb-script
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-initdb-script
        name: mongo-initdb-script

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:

        app: mongodb

      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:

              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo

        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo147_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo148_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:

              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:

              name: mongodb-secret

##### FILE: mongo152.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:7.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-vol
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo157.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongo158_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Bogota
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:4.4
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --eval
            - db.runCommand('ping').ok
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: mongo159.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: mongo
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongodb-data
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /tmp/mongodb
    name: mongodb-data

---

##### FILE: mongo164.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: mongo170.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: mongo185_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_ZONE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_ZONE
              name: configmap
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:4.4
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongo192.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-statefull

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret

        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo205.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: userName
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret

        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

kind: Deployment

  replicas: 1

          valueFrom:

              key: mongo-root-password

##### FILE: mongo22.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo222.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:6.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: mongo224.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to federation/Pod/mongo-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongo
  name: mongo-pod
  namespace: federation
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
      value: admin
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
      value: admin
    image: mongodb/mongodb-community-server:7.0.8-ubi8
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: mongo
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
      name: mongo-port
    securityContext:
      runAsGroup: 0
      runAsUser: 0
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongo-storage
  restartPolicy: Never
  securityContext:
    fsGroup: 1000
    runAsGroup: 1000
    runAsUser: 1000
  volumes:
  - name: mongo-storage
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongo-claim

---

      labels:
        app: mongo

        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME

        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD

##### FILE: mongo24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: yourspotify
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:4.4.16
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 25m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-claim

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo36.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo42.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo

##### FILE: mongo46_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      environment: test
      replicaset: MainRepSet
      role: mongo
  serviceName: mongodb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        environment: test
        replicaset: MainRepSet
        role: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --replSet
        - MainRepSet
        - --auth
        - --clusterAuthMode
        - keyFile
        - --keyFile
        - /etc/secrets-volume/internal-auth-mongodb-keyfile
        - --setParameter
        - authenticationMechanisms=SCRAM-SHA-1
        image: mongo:5.0.7
        name: mongod-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets-volume
          name: secrets-volume
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
      volumes:
      - name: secrets-volume
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: shared-bootstrap-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      annotations:
        volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: standard
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo50_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:6.0.2-focal
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo58.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/yourspotify:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: yourspotify
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/yourspotify:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: yourspotify
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: yourspotify
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

          claimName: mongo-claim

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:

      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:

      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongo81.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb-k8
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/jocelyn_pyw/mongo-backup/data/mongo-data-kubernetes
        name: mongodb-data

---

##### FILE: mongo84.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret

        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:

            memory: 64Mi

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:

        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:

              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo

            memory: 64Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: mongobd-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongodb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        replicaset: MainRepSet
        role: mongodb
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: replicaset
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - MainRepSet
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: fair_pay
        image: mongo:4.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongod-container
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: mongodb-backup-cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mongodb-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - |
              echo "Authentification sur GCS..."
              gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/etc/gcs-credentials/service-account.json
              echo "Lancement de mongodump..."
              mongodump --uri="mongodb://${MONGODB_USER}:${MONGODB_PASSWORD}@${MONGODB_HOST}" --archive="/tmp/dump.gz" --gzip
              echo "Upload du dump sur GCS..."
              gsutil cp -r /tmp/dump.gz gs://mongodb-backup-dyma
            env:
            - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: mongodb-root-password
                  name: mongodb
            - name: MONGODB_HOST
              value: mongodb-headless:27017
            - name: MONGODB_USER
              value: root
            image: thierno19/mongobackupgcs
            name: mongodb-backup
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /etc/gcs-credentials
              name: gcs-credentials
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: gcs-credentials
            secret:
              secretName: gcs-credentials
  schedule: '* * * * *'

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-cronjob-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: mongodb-backup-cronjob1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mongodb-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - |
              echo "Authentification sur GCS."
              gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/etc/gcs-credentials/service-account.json
              echo "Creation du dump..."
              mongodump --uri=mongodb://${MONGODB_USER}:${MONGODB_PASSWORD}@${MONGODB_HOST}/?readPreference=secondary --archive="/tmp/dump.gz" --gzip
              echo "Dump cr !"
              echo "upload dump on GCS..."
              gsutil -m cp "/tmp/dump.gz" gs://backup-mongodb-formation-dyma
              echo "Upload finished..."
            env:
            - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: mongodb-root-password
                  name: mongodb
            - name: MONGODB_USER
              value: root
            - name: MONGODB_HOST
              value: mongodb-headless:27017
            image: laurentt/backup-mongodb-gcs
            name: mongodb-backup
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /etc/gcs-credentials
              name: gcs-credentials
          imagePullSecrets:
          - name: docker-hub-secret
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: gcs-credentials
            secret:
              secretName: gcs-credentials
  schedule: 0 */2 * * *

---

##### FILE: mongodb-backup-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <mongo namespace>/Deployment/mongodb-backup:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: mongo-data
  name: mongodb-backup
  namespace: <mongo namespace>
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: mongo-data
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        backup.velero.io/backup-volumes: mongodump
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/command: '["bash", "-c", "cat /cred/mongo-certs/tls.crt
          /cred/mongo-certs/tls.key > /work-dir/mongo.pem; cat /cred/cluster-ca/tls.crt
          /cred/cluster-ca/tls.key > /work-dir/ca.pem; mongorestore --db platform-db
          --host rs0/icp-mongodb-0.icp-mongodb.<mongo namespace>.svc.cluster.local,icp-mongodb-1.icp-mongodb.<mongo
          namespace>.svc.cluster.local,icp-mongodb-2.icp-mongodb.<mongo namespace>.svc.cluster.local
          --port $MONGODB_SERVICE_PORT --username $ADMIN_USER --password $ADMIN_PASSWORD
          --authenticationDatabase admin --ssl --sslCAFile /work-dir/ca.pem --sslPEMKeyFile
          /work-dir/mongo.pem /dump/dump/platform-db --drop"]'
        pre.hook.backup.velero.io/command: '["bash", "-c", "rm -rf /dump/dump/*; cat
          /cred/mongo-certs/tls.crt /cred/mongo-certs/tls.key > /work-dir/mongo.pem;
          cat /cred/cluster-ca/tls.crt /cred/cluster-ca/tls.key > /work-dir/ca.pem;
          mongodump --oplog --out /dump/dump --host mongodb:$MONGODB_SERVICE_PORT
          --username $ADMIN_USER --password $ADMIN_PASSWORD --authenticationDatabase
          admin --ssl --sslCAFile /work-dir/ca.pem --sslPEMKeyFile /work-dir/mongo.pem"]'
      labels:
        foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: mongo-data
      name: mongodb-backup
      namespace: <mongo namespace>
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - sleep infinity
        env:
        - name: ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        image: icr.io/cpopen/cpfs/ibm-mongodb:4.2.1-mongodb.4.0.24
        name: mongodb-backup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dump
          name: mongodump
          subpath: dump
        - mountPath: /cred/mongo-certs
          name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        - mountPath: /cred/cluster-ca
          name: cluster-ca-cert
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: tmp-mongodb
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs-mongodump
      - name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        secret:
          secretName: icp-mongodb-client-cert
      - name: cluster-ca-cert
        secret:
          secretName: mongodb-root-ca-cert
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-mongodb

---

##### FILE: mongodb-backup-restore.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-restore:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-restore
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - |
          echo "Authentification sur GCS..."
          gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/etc/gcs-credentials/service-account.json
          echo "Tlchargement du dernier dump depuis GCS..."
          gsutil cp gs://mongodb-backup-dyma/dump.gz /tmp/dump.gz
          echo "Dcompression du dump..."
          gunzip /tmp/dump.gz
          echo "Restauration de la base de donnes..."
          mongorestore --drop --uri="mongodb://${MONGODB_USER}:${MONGODB_PASSWORD}@${MONGODB_HOST}/?readPreference=secondary" --archive="/tmp/dump"
        env:
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          value: mongodb-0.mongodb-headless.default
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          value: root
        image: thierno19/mongobackupgcs
        name: mongodb-restore
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/gcs-credentials
          name: gcs-credentials
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: gcs-credentials
        secret:
          secretName: gcs-credentials

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to databases/ConfigMap/mongodb-cm:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  createUser.js: |2

    print('---> START <---');

    use transactions
    var user = db.getUser(username);
    if(user == null){
      db.createUser(
          {
              user: "consumerUser",
              pwd: "consumer123",
              roles: [
                  { role: "readWrite", db: "transactions" }
              ]
          }
      );
      print('User created');
    }else{
      print('User already exists');
    }
    print('---> END <---');
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mongodb-cm
  namespace: databases

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: mongodb-service
  namespace: default

    targetPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodb-config-components_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db_host
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: mongodb-config-components1_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodb-dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-claim

---


Mutation:

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: mongodb-depl1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1024Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:7.0
        name: mongodb
        resources:
          limits:
            ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
          requests:
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deploy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27107

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment12_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGODB_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: mongodb/mongodb-community-server:6.0.8-ubi8
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pv-claim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.31.2 (HEAD)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mongodb
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.31.2 (HEAD)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/kubernetes-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: my-mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          hostPort: 27017
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mongodb
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment21.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongodb/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --bind_ip_all
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment27_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-db-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongo-db
  name: mongo-db-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongo-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mongo-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo-db-cntnr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo-db
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 55M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-datadisk
        - mountPath: /data/configdb
          name: mongodb-configdisk
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-datadisk
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-datadisk-pvc
      - name: mongodb-configdisk
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-configdisk-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment29.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: db
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:

      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment30.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongodb/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment32.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongodb-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongodb-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:4.4-focal
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongodb-data-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-init-js
        name: mongodb-data-volume

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment33.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-stateful-set:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb-stateful-set
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
  serviceName: mongodb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:4.4-focal
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongodb-data-volume
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-init-js
        name: mongodb-data-volume
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1G
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment38.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment-prod.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb-prod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb-prod
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - typescript-app-prod
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb-prod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-data-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-stack.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:3.6.5-jessie
        name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /mnt/some/directory/structure
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mongo-persistent-storage

---

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

##### FILE: mongo-stack1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
      name: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-mount
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:

##### FILE: mongo-stack6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:3.6.5-jessie
        name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /mnt/some/directory/structure
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mongo-persistent-storage

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefullset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to my-k8s-world/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: my-k8s-world
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: db
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        env: demo
        replicaset: rs0.main
        role: db
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: replicaset
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - rs0.main
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        image: mongo:4.2
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 0.5Gi
      storageClassName: gp2

---
