##### FILE: mongo-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      env: test
      name: mongodb
      owner: lehel
  serviceName: mongo-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        env: test
        name: mongodb
        owner: lehel
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - cp /secret /usr/local/bin/secret && chown 999:999 /usr/local/bin/secret
          && /usr/local/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh --replSet MainRepSet --bind_ip 0.0.0.0
          --keyFile /usr/local/bin/secret
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: microservice1
        image: mongo:4.0
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100M
          requests:
            memory: 100M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /secret
          name: secretkeyvolume
          subPath: secretkey
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_SIDECAR_POD_LABELS
          value: name=mongodb,env=test,owner=lehel
        - name: MONGODB_USERNAME
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGODB_DATABASE
          value: microservice1
        image: cvallance/mongo-k8s-sidecar
        name: mongo-sidecar
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100M
          requests:
            memory: 100M
      serviceAccountName: mongo-account
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: secretkeyvolume
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: mongo-secret
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: do-block-storage

---

##### FILE: mongo-stateful-set.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-stateful-set:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb-stateful-set
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb-stateful-set
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongodb-data-volume
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-init
        name: mongodb-data-volume
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5G
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: karsajobs
  name: mongo-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: karsajobs
      tier: mongodb
  serviceName: mongo-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: karsajobs
        tier: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo-credentials/MONGO_ROOT_USERNAME
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo-credentials/MONGO_ROOT_PASSWORD
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-pv
        - mountPath: /config
          name: mongo-configmap
        - mountPath: /etc/mongo-credentials
          name: mongo-secret
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-configmap
        name: mongo-configmap
      - name: mongo-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mongo-secret

---

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb-stateful-set
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongodb-data-volume
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-init
        name: mongodb-data-volume
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5G
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cloudchamp/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: cloudchamp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: db
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        env: demo
        replicaset: rs0.main
        role: db
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: replicaset
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - rs0.main
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        image: mongo:4.2
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 0.5Gi
      storageClassName: gp2

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo-headless
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:4.4
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: not-applicable
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mongo-configmap
        image: mongo:6.0
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset18.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: example
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: Ecommerce
        image: mongo:7.0.12
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: aws-ebs-gp2

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      env: test
      name: mongodb
      owner: lehel
  serviceName: mongo-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        env: test
        name: mongodb
        owner: lehel
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - cp /secret /usr/local/bin/secret && chown 999:999 /usr/local/bin/secret
          && /usr/local/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh --replSet MainRepSet --bind_ip 0.0.0.0
          --keyFile /usr/local/bin/secret
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: microservice1
        image: mongo:4.0
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100M
          requests:
            memory: 100M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /secret
          name: secretkeyvolume
          subPath: secretkey
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_SIDECAR_POD_LABELS
          value: name=mongodb,env=test,owner=lehel
        - name: MONGODB_USERNAME
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          value: mongouser
        - name: MONGODB_DATABASE
          value: microservice1
        image: cvallance/mongo-k8s-sidecar
        name: mongo-sidecar
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100M
          requests:
            memory: 100M
      serviceAccountName: mongo-account
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: secretkeyvolume
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: mongo-secret
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: do-block-storage

---

##### FILE: mongo-stateful-set2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-stateful-set:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb-stateful-set
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongodb-stateful-set
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb-stateful-set
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mongodb-data-volume
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-data-init-js
        name: mongodb-data-volume
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5G
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: karsajobs
  name: mongo-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: karsajobs
      tier: mongodb
  serviceName: mongo-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: karsajobs
        tier: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo-credentials/MONGO_ROOT_USERNAME
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo-credentials/MONGO_ROOT_PASSWORD
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-pv
        - mountPath: /config
          name: mongo-configmap
        - mountPath: /etc/mongo-credentials
          name: mongo-secret
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-configmap
        name: mongo-configmap
      - name: mongo-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mongo-secret

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cloudchamp/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: cloudchamp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: db
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        env: demo
        replicaset: rs0.main
        role: db
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: replicaset
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - rs0.main
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        image: mongo:4.2
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 0.5Gi
      storageClassName: gp2

---

##### FILE: mongo-statefulset7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to devops-mahir-submission-2-ns/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: devops-mahir-submission-2-ns
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
      tier: data
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        tier: data
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo-credentials/MONGO_ROOT_USERNAME
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo-credentials/MONGO_ROOT_PASSWORD
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-volume
        - mountPath: /config
          name: mongo-configmap
        - mountPath: /etc/mongo-credentials
          name: mongo-credential
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-persistent-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pv-claim
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-config
        name: mongo-configmap
      - name: mongo-credential
        secret:
          secretName: mongo-credential

---
